title: Home
description: Homepage for University of New Hampshire Health & Wellness.
sitename: Health & Wellness | University of New Hampshire
cleaned_text: We're your source for medical services, wellness education & promotion, and public health expertise on campus. Open to UNH students, faculty, and staff. Announcements MyHealth&Wellness A secure, online portal for your personal health management. - Make an appointment - Manage health forms - Access health history/immunization records - Upload proof of COVID-19 vaccination - Securely message with our staff - View your financial account summary Questions? Call us at (603) 862-9355. Upcoming Events No events scheduled. Please check back! [Medical Services](/health/services/medical-services) Our clinical staff takes a team approach, working with you to diagnose and treat a wide range of health issues. [Learn More](/health/services/medical-services) [Living Well Services](/health/services/living-well-services) Discover our services, programs and events designed to promote balance and well-being. We cover a variety of topics, such as stress, sleep, nutrition, sexual well-being, alcohol, and other drugs. [Learn More](/health/services/living-well-services) [Integrative Mind-Body Services](/health/services/integrative-mind-body-services) Integrative Mind-Body Services like massage therapy, light therapy, and mindfulness and meditation can improve your ability to cope with stress, manage pain, and reinforce your overall well-being. [Learn More](/health/services/integrative-mind-body-services) Want to get our updates and events every month in your inbox? Subscribe to our Health & Wellness Monthly Newsletter! Campus Resources Hours Monday 8 a.m. - 4:30 p.m. Tuesday 8 a.m. - 4:30 p.m. Wednesday 8 a.m. - 4:30 p.m. Thursday 8 a.m. - 4:30 p.m. Friday 9 a.m. - 4:30 p.m. Pharmacy closed 12:30pm -
